glsa.title: Roundcube: Arbitrary code execution
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in Roundcube could result in arbitrary code execution, SQL injection, or reading of arbitrary files.

background.p: Roundcube is a browser-based multilingual IMAP client with an application-like user interface.

description.p: A vulnerability in steps/utils/save_pref.inc allows remote attackers to use the _session parameter to change configuration settings.

impact.p: A remote attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process, inject SQL code, or read arbitrary files.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
